entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade 55th Anniversary Card 'Emerald Anniversary'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 22.45

A stylish card to give to your loved ones on their 55th Emerald Anniversary. The design boasts a heart made from ribbon roses, pom poms and gypsophila flowers. The whole composition is beautifully decorated with crystals, pearls and white chiffon ribbon. The card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade 35th Anniversary Card 'Coral Anniversary'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 22.45

This simple yet stylish luxury 35th anniversary card will be just simply ideal to wish your loved ones a Happy Coral Anniversary. The design features a heart made from peach ribbon roses, white pom poms and gypsophila flowers. The whole composition is beautifully decorated with crystals, pearls and white chiffon ribbon.

The card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade 45th Anniversary Card 'Sapphire Anniversary'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 22.45

Lovely luxury boxed 45th anniversary card - just ideal to wish that someone special a Happy Blue Sapphire Anniversary. The design features a heart made from blue ribbon roses, pom poms and white gypsophila flowers. The whole composition is beautifully decorated with crystals, pearls and white chiffon ribbon.

This anniversary card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Luxury Boxed Handmade Card 'Romantic Heart'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 22.95

A lovely ‘Romantic Heart’ handmade card to send that special message of love to your loved ones on Valentine's Day, anniversary or just because. It can be personalised with own words on front and inside, making it suitable for various occasions. The card features a heart made from ribbon roses, pom poms and white gypsophila flowers. The whole arrangement itself is gorgeously adorned with crystals, pearls and white chiffon ribbon.

This card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A4 Luxury Boxed Handmade Anniversary Card ‘Anniversary Bouquet’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 42.95

A beautiful personalised handmade card to celebrate a special anniversary. The main motif of the design is an anniversary bouquet made form ribbon roses, real dry flowers and faux greenery. The card comes in a lovely presentation box which can be kept as a keepsake.

entry.title: A4 Luxury Boxed Handmade Wedding Card ‘Wedding Bouquet’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Wedding Cards
Price: 42.95

A truly luxurious card for a very special couple on their Special Day. During a wedding newlyweds will receive plenty of cards. But you can be sure this card will stand out among others. The card comes complete with a special gift box and can be personalised with your own words on front and inside.

The design boasts a wedding bouquet of white and cream roses combined with lovely dried nigella orientalis and white gypsophila flowers. The whole arrangement is gorgeously handcrafted with crystals, small ribbon roses, hearts and large shimmering gold bow.

This wedding card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A4 Luxury Boxed Handmade Card ‘Just For You’
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 42.95

Send all your love to that special person in your life with this stylish extra-large personalised handmade card. Nothing says love more than a classic bouquet of red roses combined with lovely white gypsophila flowers. The whole arrangement is gorgeously handcrafted with crystals, red padded hearts and large shimmering red bow.

The card is presented in our signature luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside. It can presonalised with you own message both on front and inside, making it a perfect card for a loved one on Valentine’s Day, for birthdays, anniversaries, weddings and engagements.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Wedding Card 'Classic Bridal Bouquet'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Wedding Cards
Price: 22.60

Send your love and best wishes for the future together to a happy couple with this stylish wedding card. Nothing says love more than a classic bouquet of red roses combined with lovely white gypsophila flowers to create this gorgeous card.  The card is presented in our signature luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside. It can customised with you own message both on front and inside, making it also a perfect keepsake gift for a ruby 40th anniversary.

The main motif of the design is a classy bouquet made from red and silver ribbon roses and artificial white gypsophila flowers. The whole arrangement is mounted to the silver grey rose frame and handcrafted with crystals,  pearls, large white chiffon bow wand  small heart-shaped pendant.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Wedding Card 'Entwined Hearts'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Wedding Cards
Price: 19.50

Wish all the happiness in the world to a newlywed couple on their special day with this elegant and dainty handmade wedding card. The design features print of two entwined flower hearts, beautifully hand-crafted with crystals, metallic and wooden hearts, wooden 'love' letters, ivory ribbon roses, ribbons and bows.

The card can be personalised with your own words on front and inside, and will make a special anniversary or engagement card too. It is beautifully presented in specially designed luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside.

entry.title: Luxury Handmade Wedding Card 'Perfect Wedding'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Wedding Cards
Price: 22.50

This absolutely stunning and very well made luxurious wedding design offers a lovely mix of card and gift to the newlywed couple. Only one of its kind and truly stylish, it comes in our signature luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside, and will be kept and treasured for many years. The card can be personalised with your own words on front and inside, making it suitable for numerous occasions - anniversary, engagement, birthday, etc.

The main motif of the design the flower arrangement made from faux cream camellia flowers, greenery, ribbons and skeleton leaves. The whole arrangement is mounted to the white and cream paper frame in the middle of the card. Crystals and small ribbon roses are scattered over the frame, and large shimmering gold bow with clear heart-shaped pendant in the middle complete this stylish design.

This card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: A5 Boxed Handmade Photo Card 'Loving You'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Valentine's Day Cards
Price: 21.85

A special card for a special person in your life - a great keepsake gift to give to the love of your life on Valentine's Day, Birthday or Ruby 30th Anniversary. Fully customisable with you own message - it is perfect for your girlfriend or boyfriend, wife or husband, lover or just best friend. The design will be personalised with your favourite photograph mounted to the purple paper frame in the middle of the design. The whole arrangement is gorgeously adorned with crystals, metallic and wooden hearts, roses, pom poms, wooden 'love' letters and burgundy satin bow.

This handmade photo card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Photo Anniversary Card 'Happy Anniversary'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 17.95

This stylish luxury boxed photo anniversary card will be personalised with your own photo, placed on the raised silver pad in the centre of the card and decorated with crystals, silver metallic hearts, white paper hearts and white satin bow

This photo Anniversary card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Photo Anniversary Card 'On Our Anniversary'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 21.95

This gorgeous anniversary photo card is presented in luxurious gift box full of cream silk rose petals and will be just perfect keepsake gift to your loved ones on their anniversary. The design will be customised with your favourite photo mounted on raised foam pads to the print of ivory floral frame and beautifully bejewelled with crystals, cream ribbon roses, light peach silk giant rosette, cream silk rose petals and ivory satin bow.

This photo Anniversary card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Anniversary Card 'Golden Wishes'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 21.99

A gorgeous luxury boxed card - a great choice to congratulate two special people who celebrate their 50 years together on their Golden Wedding Anniversary. Truly exclusive and elegant, it is presented in specially designed gift box full of gold silk rose petals inside for that extra special little bit touch of luxury.

The design features two gold hearts with white three-dimensional flaps and gold acrylic heart-shaped pendants with middle. The hearts are mounted to the print of hand-drawn gold floral pattern and handcrafted with crystals and rhinestones, ivory pearls and cream ribbon roses.

This anniversary card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Anniversary Card 'Silver Wishes'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 21.99

Wish a happy silver anniversary to the couple who celebrate their 25 years together with this luxurious anniversary card presented in gift box full of white silver rose petals. It will be an absolutely wonderful keepsake gift to a special couple and will be kept and cherished for many years to come.

The design boasts two silver hearts with white three-dimensional flaps and silver acrylic heart-shaped pendants with middle. The hearts are mounted to the print of hand-drawn grey floral pattern and decorated with crystals and rhinestones, nailheads and silver ribbon roses.

This anniversary card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed 40th Anniversary Card 'Ruby Anniversary'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 18.95

This beautiful luxury boxed Ruby Wedding Anniversary card made especially to congratulate your Husband or Wife, Mum and Dad or your best friends on their 40th Anniversary. The design features print of burgundy floral heart decorated with silk burgundy ribbon roses, crystals, rhinestones and burgundy satin ribbons.

This anniversary card can be completely customised with your own words or verse making it a truly special Ruby Anniversary keepsake. It is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Anniversary Card 'On Our Wedding Anniversary'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 19.95

Stylish and elegant luxury anniversary card - a fantastic choice for sending your special anniversary wishes to your near and dear ones. The card features two heart shaped clear acrylic pendants mounted to cream paper hearts, tied together with cream satin ribbons and beautifully decorated with peach and clear real crystals, gold metallic hearts and cream and white satin bow.

This anniversary card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Anniversary Card 'Orchids'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Anniversary Cards
Price: 17.95

Elegant and classy luxury boxed anniversary card - just ideal to wish your husband or wife, friends or family members a Very Happy Anniversary. The design boasts two green silk orchids phalaenopsis placed on the yellow and white square frame in the middle of the card and embellished with crystals and rhinestones, cream satin ribbons and bow.

This anniversary card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.
